hadiths.text: Narrated Anas:The Prophet (ﷺ) saw a man driving a Badana (a camel for sacrifice) and said (to him). "Ride it." The man said, "It is a Bandana." The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Ride on it." The man said, "It is a Bandana." The Prophet (ﷺ) said, Ride on it, woe to you

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي قَوْلِ الرَّجُلِ وَيْلَكَ
